name: Dwelling
overview: Dwelling is an adult horror adventure. One summer, on a sleepy night, the ghost of a college teacher appears in the hero's dream, telling him that the vampires killed him and the mansion has been taken over. Then he asks to rescue his daughter, Anya, who is being captured. To help Anya rescue, he tells the hero to help the servant who is also captured. That's why the hero takes the trouble to fly to the college teacher's house.
